data.name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lent's Swimsuit "Beach Flag King"
data.detailed_description:
Adds the "Beach Flag King" swimming costume for Lent.

Note:
- Costumes can be changed in the “Changing Room” accessible through the desk in the Atelier. Characters need to join the party before their costumes can be changed.
- This item is included in the “Atelier Ryza 2 Season Pass” and “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy Ultimate Edition” sets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 over or 1280x720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 over or 1920x1080 over display
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
